vsParam:
So, you've seen how to make practical items.
Now we're in the final stage of the alchemy dojo, Nelke!

The final stage...!
Master, my next assignment is...

Hehe... Right... To wrap up what you've learned so far,
the next assignment is to gather and synthesize all at once!

Yeah, you need to gather ingredients and synthesize them!
For an alchemist, it's a basic requirement, so, do it all at once.

You can ask others to help you gather ingredients.
But you need to synthesize by yourself, Nelke... OK?

Got it. I'll try my best.
So, which item should I make...?
Oh, Totori and Escha will make the choice for you!

Yeah. Actually, it's not that hard.
We've chosen a very practical item.
Hehe... What you need to make is... "Healing Aroma"!

It's an item from our world, so I think you know
its characteristics, Nelke...

You need to use the recipe of the Academy, so it will
have nothing to do with the alchemy in our world!

Use the recipe of this world to make an item familiar to me.
... Got it.

To synthesize "Healing Aroma"...
I, Nelke, accept this challenge!

Yeah, that's the spirit!
So, those who will help you gather ingredients are...

In addition to neutralizers... necessary ingredients
include "Comfrey" and "Rose Petals".

You can't do anything without ingredients.
First, let's start gathering now.

Yeah. It's for Nelke!
Guys, let's go to gather superb ingredients!
It'll be wonderful as long as we do this together!

So... Let's go!
Let's complete the final assignment given by Master!
